channel.title: Super Metroid
channel.description:
Does anyone else play this gem of a game? I've played it multiple times, sometimes even in one sitting. In fact, I long-played it [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C4FxdQIqZrc]Here[/url] because I love it so much. There's also a long-play done by the YouTube user Brickroadbrickroad who upload a 3:15:00 playthrough of it on Christmas and I've honestly watched it at least 5 times. The game just never gets old. The usb SNES controller I have also has the game to thank :P
But anyways, what are your guys's thoughts? Do you like any other Metroid games? Etc etc...
~Lin

item.title: Super Metroid
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

metroid prime was my first, but super metroid is also a great game. i have it on an emulator for my phone and I play it a lot.

Read full topic
